title: if you smite the scuttlecrab...
body: you should get a buff where whenever there is an incoming skillshot, scuttle autopilot takes over and jukes all the skillshots.

replies.body: No if you smite the crab should get a decaying 75% movespeed buff of easy travel ;)
i'd like to point out that this person stole your idea http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/uOrwxJpE-smite-scuttle-buff-please-read

I hope you realise that this idea is similar, but not exact.
His idea was to get a smite scuttle crab buff and make the scuttle crab juke the skillshots.
Mine was to make the scuttle crab juke INTO the skillshots to instead of smiting dragon/baron for that objective teamfight.
I believe mine was more practical.
